message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. Accept this and we can move on.
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not going to be generous
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Meet me in the middle or I'll walk away.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect any more
Time's running out, Bob. Meet me at 55/45 or I'll walk away for good.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give you the majority
It's time to split it down the middle, Bob. No more games.
